oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tents serve as temporary housing in the Saudi Arabian desert for members of the Tennessee National Guard, circa 1990 November 15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of several Tennessee National Guard soldiers walking across an open area in front of a load of supplies, surrounded by numerous tents serving as living quarters for the troops in the Saudi Arabian desert during Operation Desert Shield. The photograph was taken by Nashville Banner photographer Larry McCormack on assignment in Saudi Arabia in November 1990. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph transparency : col ; 35mm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee. National Guard; Tennessee. Military Dept.; United States. National Guard Bureau; Tennessee. Army National Guard
